item.title: My First Event Coordination Experience: DataVoid Trivia 2025
item.description:
From a casual CN Lab day to a full-on TechFest triumph — here’s how it all unfolded.

Setting the Scene

Right now, as I’m writing this, I’m about to enter my 7th semester of engineering. But the story I’m about to tell you happened a few months back, during my 6th semester at VJCET — our college. Every even semester, our college hosts the biggest events of the year: TechFest and ArtFest. It’s that season when college vibes shift into celebration mode — banners go up, registrations open, stages get set, and energy runs wild across campus.
